about_product.title: Patrol Leather - 42mm
about_product.heading: The Patrol is for those who are on time, all the time.
about_product.text: 24-hour indices on the inner bezel surround pronounced numerical markers on the face. It's got a slim profile paired with a genuine leather band that's a modern take on a classic field watch.

comments.user_question: Hey Brad, beautiful watch man. Can you recommend a good alternate leather band to compliment?
comments.influencer_response: I got the Fullmosa leather strap and it looks great.
